short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The UNiDAYS extension allows you to easily access the UNiDAYS website to get your student discount at all your favourite brands.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Never miss a student discount ever again—as you shop online, the UNiDAYS Chrome extension instantly alerts you to any unmissable student savings... it’s that easy!

No more switching between tabs to search for top student offers, you can access 800+ brands and thousands of offers on the UNiDAYS network straight from your browser, right as you shop—the Chrome extension does the legwork for you.

Whether you’re upgrading your tech, shopping the latest fashion trends, engaging with online wellbeing tools or stocking up on school supplies, the Chrome extension will save you £££ with it’s *magic* discount alerts!

Not yet a UNiDAYS member? It’s easy to start saving. Hit ‘Join’ and verify your student status using your institution’s portal, email address or photo ID, then you’ll have access to a budget-saving world of student savings, content, earning opportunities and more.

The UNiDAYS extension pops up on partner sites while you browse! Please be aware that it may conflict with other discount related extensions you have installed.
